channel.title: Statistics, Time Series on Dr. Juan Camilo Orduz

item.title: Exploring TensorFlow Probability STS Forecasting
item.description: In this notebook we explore the Structural Time Series (STS) Module of TensorFlow Probability. We follow closely the use cases presented in their Medium blog. As described there: An STS model expresses an observed time series as the sum of simpler components 1: \[ f(t) = \sum_{k=1}^{N}f_{k}(t) + \varepsilon, \quad \text{where}\quad \varepsilon \sim N(0, \sigma^2). \] Each summand \(f_{k}(t)\) has a particular structure, e.g.Â specific seasonality, trend, autoregressive terms, etc.
